channel.title: For children 6-7 years old on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in For children 6-7 years old on Game6r

item.title: American Cars Jigsaw
item.description: The rules of the game Puzzles for children 6 7 years old are very simple. You need to assemble a picture from a large number of separate fragments. Pick a place for each part of the puzzle, and if something doesn’t work out, use the hint. It can be called by pressing a special button at the top of the playing field.

item.title: Math Test Challenge
item.description: A fun educational game for kids who have just started learning arithmetic. Remember everything that you were taught at school, pick up the mouse and solve the proposed examples by clicking on the number that is the correct answer. Take your time and think carefully, many of the puzzles in this game are tricky and not as easy as they seem at first glance.
